lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Bernard Howard. He leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Bernard's beloved wife, Irma; Bernard's children, Kathy (Mitchell), Ellen (Sy), Lorrie (Stuart), and Ned (Debra); his grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
